extendedInfo.description: WRAL Out & About is the Triangle's free dining, nightlife, and entertainment app from WRAL.com. View Party Pics, restaurant listings, concert dates, and more for Raleigh, Durham, Cary, Chapel Hill, and surrounding areas. Read What's On Tap from our local editors daily for a look at your Best Bets for food, drinks, and good times in the Triangle.- Find restaurants, bars, nightclubs, musical acts and other events based on your current location- Browse both movie theaters and movies based on your location- Sort search results by distance, relevance and user ratings- Map events and locations and get driving directions- Tap to dial phone numbers- What's on Tap: Editors' blog updated daily- Best Bets: Our editors highlight the best events for you- Party Pics from your favorite bars and events- Five Faves: We tell you who has the best (fill in the blank) in the Triangle- Local concert and music calendar listings- Shopping, retail, arts, sports, pets, yard sales, and even more are all included- More comprehensive than other apps, which often list only places and not events

reviews.title: Crashes (LG Spectrum 2)
reviews.comment: Crashes after intro screen \"...Out and About has stopped\". Tried un-installing & re-installing twice.
reviews.author: Skip Bradley

reviews.title: useful and fun!
reviews.comment: Combines business listings with events like movie showtimes and concerts for downtown Raleigh and the rest of the Triangle.  Very convenient when you\'re looking for something to do.  The party pictures and the reviews like \"Five Faves\" make it a lot more interesting than most guide apps.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Handy to have on the go
reviews.comment: Good source of local events and love that restaurants are displayed that are close by. Party pics are great, too!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Local and useful!
reviews.comment: Geo-linked results make category searching -- for movies, restaurants, retail -- quick and very, very relevant.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Great app for all relevant information about what\'s going on around the Triangle.
reviews.author: John Goodwin

reviews.title: Cool app
reviews.comment: Very cool app for figuring out what\'s going on around town. Especially dig the party pics.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Can\'t open
reviews.comment: Was looking forward to this app.  Will not open.  I downloaded uninstalled restarted the phone and installed again.  It will not open on my Droid RAZR MAXX
reviews.author: Russell Galvan
